description: This module segments hypothalamic subunits and can be run in two modes: on FreeSurfer subjects or on any T1-weighted scan(s) of approximately 1mm resolution.

subjects.title: Subjects
subjects.description: (required in FS mode) Name of one or several subjects in $SUBJECTS_DIR on which to run the module, assuming recon-all has been run on the specified subjects.

write_posteriors.title: Write Posteriors Flag
write_posteriors.description: (FS mode, optional) Save posteriors; default is False.

image_input.title: Image Input
image_input.description: (required in T1 mode) Image(s) to segment. Can be a path to a single image or to a folder.

output.title: Output
output.description: (required in T1 mode) Segmentation output(s). Must be a folder if --i designates a folder.

posteriors.title: Posteriors
posteriors.description: (T1 mode, optional) Posteriors output(s). Must be a folder if --i designates a folder.

resample.title: Resample
resample.description: (T1 mode, optional) Resampled image(s). Must be a folder if --i designates a folder.

volume_output.title: Volume Output
volume_output.description: (T1 mode, optional) Output CSV file with volumes for all structures and subjects.

crop_size.title: Crop Size
crop_size.description: (both modes, optional) Size of the central patch to analyse (must be divisible by 8). The whole image is analysed by default.

threads.title: Threads
threads.description: (both modes, optional) Number of cores to be used. Default uses 1 core.

cpu.title: CPU Flag
cpu.description: (both modes, optional) Enforce running with CPU rather than GPU.
